ing: 1/2 habanero pepper, seeded and chopped, or more to taste
1/2 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
des: "My mother is from the Caribbean and this is the chutney I grew up with. It's a lot easier to make than many other versions of chutney."
ins: Blend mango, garlic, habanero pepper, cilantro, lime juice, and salt in a blender until desired consistency is reached.
